name: floppily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a floppy way (= soft and not able to keep a strong or firm position): If you fall, try to relax: you are less likely to be injured if you land as floppily as possible. The singer danced floppily at the front of the stage, hiding behind dark glasses.
More examplesFewer examplesHe sat floppily at the keyboard like a broken puppet.Fold the fruit into the custard and add 250 ml of floppily whipped cream.The flowers were lounging about floppily with their heads hanging.
